title: Introduction to C Programming
details: Learn C programming fundamentals. Cover syntax, data types, and basic algorithms to kickstart your coding journey.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
details: Master algorithmic thinking. Explore sorting, searching, and graph algorithms to solve complex problems efficiently.

title: Introduction to C++ for DSA
details: Blend C++ programming with data structures and algorithms. Build a solid foundation for competitive programming.

title: Basic Data Structures
details: Explore essential data structures like arrays, linked lists, and trees. Enhance problem-solving skills effectively.

title: Introduction to OOP Python
details: Learn Python's object-oriented programming. Develop reusable code and design software with elegance and efficiency.

title: Software Engineering
details: Dive into software development methodologies, design patterns, and project management. Build high-quality software products.

title: AWS Cloud Computing
details: Harness the power of AWS for scalable and secure cloud solutions. Deploy modern applications effectively and efficiently.

title: Database (MySQL)
details: Master MySQL database management. Design efficient schemas and query data for various applications and projects.

title: Problem-Solving Part
details: Sharpen your problem-solving skills. Tackle coding challenges and real-world problems effectively and confidently.
